huskylensV2.controlMotor: Control the motor module to run
huskylensV2.controlMotorStop: Control the motor module to stop running
huskylensV2.controlLED: Control the left and right LED switches
huskylensV2.readLineSensorState: Get the status of the line-following sensor. Returns 0 when the car is on white paper, returns 1 when in the air/on black paper
huskylensV2.readLineSensorData: Get the ADC data of the line-following sensor
huskylensV2.readUltrasonic: Get the data from the ultrasonic sensor (CM)
huskylensV2.rgb: Set three primary colors: red, green, blue
huskylensV2.ledRange: RGB lights, from the start position number to the end position number
huskylensV2.setIndexColor: Set the color of the specified LED light
huskylensV2.showColor: Set the color of all RGB lights
huskylensV2.setBrightness: Set the brightness of the RGB lights
huskylensV2.intersectionDetecting: Return value: 1 is a crossroad, 2 is a left and right turn intersection (T-junction), 3 is a left turn and straight intersection, 4 is a right turn and straight intersection
huskylensV2.readRealTimeSpeed: Return value unit: centimeters per second (cm/s)
